overview: Like every summer, Marina and Fred rent a superb apartment on the beach of the naturist camp of Cap d'Agde. The couple enjoys the sun and the sea but especially the many horny males who hang out in the neighborhood... Indeed, Fred offers to his wife some cocks to fuck her and make her come as she likes. One day, their next door neighbor comes to complain about Marina's screams of pleasure. She ends up screaming even louder than her thanks to a man she met at the beach!
title: 2 Libertines At The Cap D'Agde
